resources.string: We recommend you to add and record at least 10 affirmations to get the best results
Affirmations added to be played in playlist.
Affirmations added to be played in playlist.
I am worthy of love and kindness.
Are you sure you want to delete this recording? This action cannot be undone.

string-array.name: affirmations_list
string-array.item: I am worthy of love and kindness.
My life is a reflection of the positive energy I put into the world.
I trust in the process of life and let go of control.
I am a source of inspiration and motivation for others.
I attract abundance into my life with every breath I take.
Today, I choose joy and gratitude.
I am open to receiving the abundance of the universe
I release all fears and embrace the power within me.
My mind is filled with positive and loving thoughts.
I am a magnet for success and prosperity.
I am surrounded by supportive and uplifting people.
My possibilities are endless, and my potential is limitless.
I am confident, strong, and capable of achieving my goals.
I choose to be kind to myself and others.
Every challenge I face is an opportunity for growth and learning.
I trust the journey, even when I do not understand it.
I am at peace with my past, present, and future.
I radiate confidence, self-respect, and inner harmony.
My life is a constant stream of miracles and blessings.
I am in control of my thoughts, and I choose positivity.
I am aligned with the energy of abundance.
I am deserving of success, happiness, and fulfillment.
I let go of comparison and celebrate my unique qualities.
I am a vessel of love and compassion.
I am creating a life of passion, purpose, and joy.
I release all negativity from my mind and body.
I am grateful for the abundance that flows into my life.
My heart is open to giving and receiving love.
I attract positive experiences by being a positive person.
I am a beacon of light, and my energy is contagious.
I trust the timing of my life.
I am surrounded by opportunities, and I choose to seize them.
I am constantly evolving and improving.
I am the architect of my life, and I build its foundation with love and care.
I release the need for perfection and embrace my authentic self.
I am open to new and exciting possibilities.
I am a powerful creator, and I create the life I desire.
I am resilient and can overcome any obstacle.
I am a unique and valuable person.
I am filled with confidence, and my potential is limitless.
I trust in my ability to achieve my goals.
I am a magnet for miracles, and I am open to receiving them.
I choose to let go of what I can\'t control and focus on what I can.
I am worthy of all the good things life has to offer.
I am a loving and lovable person.
I attract positivity, and positive things come to me effortlessly.
I release the past and live fully in the present moment.
I am grateful for the lessons of the past and excited for the blessings of the future.
I am constantly learning, growing, and evolving.
I am a beacon of love, and I attract loving relationships into my life.
